aima.core.environment.connectfour

Class ConnectFourGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • aima.core.environment.connectfour.ConnectFourGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Game<ConnectFourState,java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String>

    public class ConnectFourGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements Game<ConnectFourState,java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String>
    Provides an implementation of the ConnectFour game which can be used for experiments with the Minimax algorithm.
    Author:
    Ruediger Lunde

      • getPlayer

        public java.lang.String getPlayer(int playerNum)
        Returns the player corresponding to the specified player number. For efficiency reasons, ConnectFourStates use numbers instead of strings to identify players.

      • getPlayerNum

        public int getPlayerNum(java.lang.String player)
        Returns the player number corresponding to the specified player. For efficiency reasons, ConnectFourStates use numbers instead of strings to identify players.
